channel.title: Elixir Quiz
channel.description: Weekly programming problems to help you learn Elixir

item.title: Heightmap
item.description: [CDATA[ A programming challenge in which we generate a random terrain that could potentially be used in a game. ]]

item.title: Run Length Encoding
item.description: [CDATA[ A programming challenge in which we take strings of uppercase characters, and return a version that has been compressed with the Run Length Encoding algorithm ]]

item.title: FizzBuzz
item.description: [CDATA[ For our first problem, we tackle the classic interview question: FizzBuzz. ]]
